ModMetaData.name: Ratkin Glasses Recategorized
ModMetaData.author: hourai_haikus
ModMetaData.description: I noticed that the ratkin glasses set from the Ratkin race is in the 'Headwear' category, causing it impossible to use with other hats. So inspired on the NightVision goggles patch, I made this patch to make the glasses in the Eye Cover. Requires NewRatkinPlus.
